entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
